rows.label: tlk70000056_01_msg0001
rows.name:
I know all sorts of stuff! Like
how the more Drivers use their
weapons, the stronger they get.

rows.label: tlk70000056_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Some start out with the power
of fire or water, too.

rows.label: tlk70000056_01_msg0003
rows.name:
My da told me that how a
Driver chooses their weapon
is important, too.

rows.label: tlk70000056_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Tried to be a Driver...but
he couldn't do it.

rows.label: tlk70000056_01_msg0005
rows.name:
But he said it was enough
for him to be me 'n my
sister's da! Isn't that cool?
